title: Inception
description: A mind-bending science fiction thriller that explores the concept of dream manipulation.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: The Godfather
description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Dark Knight
description: When the menace known as The Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life of a simple man with a low I.Q. who unwittingly influences several people and historic events.

title: Gladiator
description: A former Roman General seeks justice after being betrayed by a corrupt prince and sent into slavery.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer programmer discovers a dystopian world dominated by sentient machines and joins a group of rebels fighting against them.

title: Avatar
description: A paraplegic marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: A young hobbit, Frodo Baggins, embarks on a perilous journey to destroy a powerful ring that could bring about the end of the world.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
description: A young farm boy embarks on a journey to rescue a princess and confront the evil Galactic Empire with the help of allies.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI agent consults an imprisoned serial killer to help catch another killer on the loose.

title: Schindler's List
description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
